text: Ndipo pakati pawo pali anthu amene amapembedza milungu ina mâ€™malo mwa Mulungu weniweni. Iwo amaikonda iyo monga momwe amkondera Mulungu. Koma iwo amene ali okhulupirira amakhala ndi chikondi chosefukira pa Mulungu. Ngati anthu osakhulupirira akadaona, pamene iwo adzaona chilango chawo akadadziwa kuti Mulungu ndiye mwini mphamvu ndi kuti Mulungu amapereka chilango chowawa
